dangers.description: While possums are generally harmless, they can cause significant damage:

risks.title: Property Damage
risks.description: Possums can damage roofs, ceilings, and insulation.

risks.title: Health Risks
risks.description: Possum droppings can carry diseases and parasites.

risks.title: Noise Disturbance
risks.description: Nocturnal activity can disrupt sleep.

rodent-control.title: Rodent Control

rodent-control.heroDescription: Expert rodent control with guaranteed results and 6-month warranty protection. Our comprehensive approach eliminates mice and rats while preventing future infestations.

overview.title: Professional Rodent Control Services
overview.subtitle: Complete Mouse and Rat Elimination
overview.description: Rodents pose serious health risks and can cause extensive property damage. Our comprehensive rodent control services eliminate mice and rats while providing long-term prevention solutions.

dangers.title: Dangers of Rodent Infestations
dangers.description: Rodents are not just a nuisance - they pose serious health and safety risks:

risks.title: Health Hazards
risks.description: Rodents carry diseases like salmonella, hantavirus, and leptospirosis that can be transmitted to humans.

risks.title: Property Damage
risks.description: Mice and rats can damage electrical wiring, insulation, and structural components of buildings.

risks.title: Food Contamination
risks.description: Rodents contaminate food supplies and surfaces with their droppings, urine, and hair.

risks.title: Fire Hazards
risks.description: Chewed electrical wires can create fire hazards and electrical failures.

whyChooseUs.title: Why Choose Our Rodent Control Services

benefits.title: Guaranteed Results
benefits.description: We offer a 6-month warranty on all rodent control treatments with follow-up services.

benefits.title: Comprehensive Approach
benefits.description: We treat the entire property, not just visible areas, ensuring complete elimination.

benefits.title: Safe Treatments
benefits.description: Our methods are safe for children, pets, and the environment while being highly effective.

benefits.title: Expert Technicians
benefits.description: Our certified technicians have extensive experience in rodent control and prevention.

benefits.title: Prevention Focus
benefits.description: We don't just eliminate current infestations - we prevent future ones with long-term solutions.

steps.title: Thorough Inspection
steps.description: Complete property assessment to identify entry points, nesting areas, and infestation extent.

steps.title: Customized Treatment Plan
steps.description: Develop targeted treatment strategy based on property layout and rodent species present.

steps.title: Safe Elimination
steps.description: Apply professional-grade treatments using safe, effective methods for complete elimination.

steps.title: Entry Point Sealing
steps.description: Seal all potential entry points to prevent rodents from re-entering the property.

steps.title: Prevention Measures
steps.description: Install deterrents and provide recommendations for ongoing prevention.

steps.title: Follow-up Services
steps.description: Return for inspection and additional treatment if needed, covered by our warranty.

faqs.question: How long does rodent control treatment take?
faqs.answer: Initial treatment takes 2-3 hours, with follow-up visits scheduled to ensure complete elimination.

faqs.question: Are your treatments safe for pets and children?
faqs.answer: Yes, we use pet and child-safe treatments that are effective against rodents but harmless to humans and pets.

faqs.question: What's included in your 6-month warranty?
faqs.answer: Our warranty covers follow-up treatments if rodents return within 6 months of initial service.

faqs.question: How do you prevent rodents from returning?
faqs.answer: We seal entry points, install deterrents, and provide recommendations for ongoing prevention.

faqs.question: Do you offer emergency rodent control?
faqs.answer: Yes, we provide emergency and same-day rodent control services for urgent situations.

risks.description: Bee stings can cause severe allergic reactions and may be life-threatening for some individuals.

risks.title: Structural Damage
risks.description: Bee hives in walls or ceilings can cause structural damage and honey can attract other pests.

risks.title: Property Access Issues
risks.description: Bees can make areas of your property inaccessible and affect outdoor activities.

risks.title: Honey Damage
risks.description: Honey from wall hives can damage building materials and create moisture issues.

faqs.question: Do you kill the bees during removal?
faqs.answer: We prioritize relocating bees to safe locations rather than extermination, preserving these important pollinators.

faqs.question: How long does bee removal take?
faqs.answer: Bee removal typically takes 2-4 hours, depending on the size and location of the hive.

faqs.question: What should I do if I see a bee swarm?
faqs.answer: Keep your distance and contact us immediately. Swarms are temporary and can be safely relocated.
